name: Do (not) touch the spikes
description:
"Minimalist" game, use mouse inside the aiming circle to launch the ball.
Force and direction depends on the mouse placement. Try not to aim too close/parallel to the surface, big jumps are better 'simulated'.

Made for Wowie Jam 3.0
The topic is: FAILURE IS PROGRESS
Let's mess with the concepts of winning and losing.
